spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . Eric Schmidt was drafted in as chief executive in 2001 to provide "adult supervision" for the fledgling search engine. The 55-year-old will become executive chairman of the internet powerhouse, and will focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . Page returns to the job, which he relinquished to Eric Schmidt in 2001 when investors called for a more experienced business leader.
